entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Baddeck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:03 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Baddeck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 01:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: NE 24 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning except plus 1 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Periods of rain except freezing rain over higher terrain early this evening. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning except plus 1 over the Highlands. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain over the Highlands early in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches dissipating early in the evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Windy. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
